name: oppgtopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: 3eqtr2i(c0, cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2), co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c2))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(ctopn, c2))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(ctopn, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopOpen ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopOpen ` c2)
⊣ ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2))=(TopOpen ` c2)
⊣ ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2))=(TopOpen ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c2))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(ctopn, c2))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(ctopn, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopOpen ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopOpen ` c2)
⊣ ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2))=(TopOpen ` c2)
⊣ ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2))=(TopOpen ` c1)

body.pretty:

⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)
